alert.note: Alert for Hempstead; Nevada (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 11 at 11:57PM CDT until March 12 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Hempstead County in southwestern Arkansas... Nevada County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until midnight CST. * At 1056 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Washington to 7 miles southeast of Prescott to Chidester, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. Trained spotters reported quarter size hail in Prescott at 1044 PM CST. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hope, Prescott, Emmet, Blevins, Perrytown, Rosston, Washington, Willisville, Bodcaw, Bluff City, White Oak Lake State Park, McCaskill, Cale, Patmos, Oakhaven, Young, Sutton, Waterloo, Boughton and Mount Moriah. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
